So/CC I/PRP hope/VBP this/DT recipe/NN will/MD be/VB useful/NN for/IN anyone/PRP who/WP wants/VBZ to/TO make/VB this/DT yummy/JJ dish/NN at/IN home/NN ./. My/PRP$ new/JJ Ariston/NNP OpenSpace/NNP Oven/. As/CC with/IN all/DT government/NN recommendations/NN ,/, it/PRP is/VBZ done/VBN to/TO give/VB a/DT wide/JJ margin/NN of/IN error/NN ./. -LRB-/NNP Singlish/NNP :/: Kia/NNP Su/NNP -RRB-/NNP ./. Meat/NNP proteins/NNP denature/NNP at/IN 55-65/NNP degrees/NNS ./. ie/IN once/RB your/PRP$ meat/NN reaches/JJ 65/NN degrees/NNS it/PRP is/VBZ essentially/RB cooked/VBN ./. But/CC with/IN chicken/NN the/DT concern/NN is/VBZ Salmonella/RB ./. The/DT consensus/NN is/VBZ to/TO cook/VB your/PRP$ meat/NN to/TO 65/VB degrees/NNS for/IN 10/CD minutes/NN or/CC 70/NN degrees/NNS for/IN 2/CD minutes/NNS ./. But/CC the/DT trick/NN is/VBZ to/TO ensure/VB that/IN the/DT whole/JJ chicken/NN is/VBZ cooked/VBN to/TO that/WDT temperature/NN ./. But/CC that/WDT is/VBZ only/RB applicable/JJ if/IN you/PRP are/VBP using/VBG a/DT real/JJ kampung/NN or/CC free/JJ range/NN chicken/NN ./. For/IN the/DT purpose/NN of/IN my/PRP$ roast/NN chicken/NN ,/, I/PRP try/VB to/TO get/VB an/DT internal/JJ temperature/NN of/IN 70/JJ degrees/NNS as/IN it/PRP ensures/VBZ that/IN the/DT meat/NN is/VBZ safe/JJ to/TO eat/VB and/CC as/IN long/JJ as/IN you/PRP do/VBP n't/RB hold/VB it/PRP too/RB long/JJ beyond/NN that/IN temperature/NN ,/, the/DT chicken/NN will/MD be/VB nice/JJ ,/, juicy/JJ and/CC safe/JJ to/TO eat/VB ./. Now/RB if/IN you/PRP are/VBP trying/VBG to/TO impress/VB your/PRP$ wife/NN on/IN your/PRP$ first/JJ wedding/NN anniversary/NN ,/, that/PRP 's/VBZ fine/JJ ./. Otherwise/JJ ,/, I/PRP think/VB for/IN practical/NN home/NN cooking/NN ,/, this/DT is/VBZ impractical/NN and/CC most/NN of/IN us/PRP will/MD stumble/VB at/IN the/DT Poularde/JJ de/NN Bresse/NN stage/NN ./. So/CC I/PRP wanted/VBD to/TO do/VB something/NN practical/JJ but/CC still/RB employing/VBD some/NN of/IN Heston/NN 's/POS techniques/NN to/TO achieve/VB a/DT Crispy/NNP Roast/NNP Chicken/NNP like/IN they/PRP serve/VBP in/IN Cantonese/JJ restaurants/NN ./. This/DT happens/VBZ because/IN the/DT juices/NNS from/IN within/VBG the/DT muscle/JJ fibers/NN of/IN the/DT breast/NN meat/NN starts/VBZ to/TO get/VB squeezed/VBD out/RP when/WRB it/PRP reaches/RB 68/JJ degrees/NNS Celsius/RB ./. I/PRP find/VB that/WDT brining/VBZ this/DT way/NN gives/VBZ it/PRP that/IN juiciness/NN and/CC flavor/NN but/CC does/VBZ n't/RB take/VB up/IN too/RB much/JJ space/NN in/IN the/DT fridge/NN ./. The/DT key/NN is/VBZ to/TO cook/VB the/DT chicken/NN to/TO 70/VB degrees/NNS and/CC there/RB are/VBP various/JJ ways/NN to/TO do/VB this/DT ./. If/IN you/PRP are/VBP the/DT patient/NN type/NN ./. The/DT skin/NN will/MD also/VB be/VB browned/JJ although/CC it/PRP is/VBZ not/RB quite/RB as/IN attractive/JJ as/IN the/DT chicken/NN in/IN Option/NNP A./NNP Just/RB make/VB sure/VB you/PRP remove/VB the/DT chicken/NN quickly/RB as/IN it/PRP can/MD quickly/RB become/VBN dry/JJ ./.
